nodes.text: Orchis was a planet located in the Inner Rim region. Historian Eloc Throno included a map with the location of Orchis in his book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, a guide that detailed the planet Batuu. Orchis shared its name with the moon Orchis 2, home of the Graf Archive.
Orchis was mentioned in the 2020 reference book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by Cole Horton.
